r.s: An Object Oriented Interface to the W3C CSS Validator service.
r.d:
This package provides an object oriented interface to the API of the W3 CSS Validator application (http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/). With this package you can connect to a running instance of the validator and retrieve the validation results (true|false) as well as the errors and warnings for a a style sheet.
By using the SOAP 1.2 output format from the validator, you are returned simple objects containing all the information from the validator.
r.n:
Automatically built QA release Bug #15674 testValidateUri() is broken - doconnor
Req #16473 Change to HTTP_Request2 - doconnor
